name: Auclair Lillehammer XC Gloves - Women's
description: Excellent gloves for cross-country skiing or other high-output cold weather activities.Four-way stretch nylon mesh backs are easy-moving and highly breathable.Brushed polyester linings for comfort and dryness against the skin.Goatskin palms for grip and durability.3M® Thinsulate® insulation provides warmth without bulk.
